H0.text: where does the largest amount of federal tax revenue come from. New York

H2.text: where does the largest amount of federal tax revenue come from. Florida

H3.text: where does the largest amount of federal tax revenue come from. California

A4.text: In 2019, residents and businesses in only 8 states contributed, as a whole, more money to the federal treasury than they received in services. Per capita, these were Connecticut ($1,614), Massachusetts ($1,439), New York ($1,172), New Jersey ($1,163), Minnesota ($336), Colorado ($239), California ($168), and Utah ($130).

A5.text: Per capita, these were Connecticut ($1,614), Massachusetts ($1,439), New York ($1,172), New Jersey ($1,163), Minnesota ($336), Colorado ($239), California ($168), and Utah ($130).
